Topic.Title: Possible to edit 'require other object' response?

Posts.EditableText: Is it possible to edit the response the is returned when the player tries to use the wrong item when using the 'require other object' function, at the moment it says "that doesn't work', for all items except the one that is required, but for some attempts/objects I'd like to give a hint (as one of the objects needs to be transformed)

Posts.EditableText: For each item that you want to have a different response, add it as a new object to the list.  The default response will be applied to all of those NOT on that list.  That should help if I understand your questions correctly.
